creator: ICMO Software
descriptionHtml:
All features are for free! By using our user-friendly interface, you can easily;

1) Create and manage your shopping lists,
2) Add products from our editable Product Catalog to your list,
3) Calculate the cost for your list,
4) Send/share your lists with your friends,
5) Set an alarm to receive notification during your planned shopping-time,
6) Track your list as quantity and cost by marking the relevant products


Highlighted features:

- Editable Product Catalog with different categories
- Ability to add new category and product to catalog
- Ability to search among all products in catalog
- Ability to add price information for each product in catalog
- Language selection for app and catalog

- Ability to add new products to your list by using catalog
- Making suggestions while typing the product name
- Ability to adjust quantity and price of each product
- Ability to mark desired products as favorite
- Quick access to favorite product list
- Total /selected /remaining cost calculation for your list
- Ability to set an alarm for your list

- Ability to send list to your friends
- Ability to send message along with the list
- In addition to in-app sending, ability to share list by whatsapp, e-mail, message etc.
- Ability to create Contact list
- Getting notification for each received list
- Manage received lists as if it was created by you

Your feedback is very important to us. If you have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us at “icmosoftware@gmail.com“.
descriptionShort: All you need for a shopping plan! Create and manage your lists easily.

title: Shopping List - Smart Shopping

creator: ICMO Software
descriptionHtml:
All features are for free! You can save time and money by using our application.

Highlighted features:

- We designed our user-friendly interface such that it is easy to use and includes all the features you may need for shopping.
- By using our editable Product Catalog, which will be your biggest assistant during list creation, you can easily find any product you want or you can use search button to search entire database.
- You can add new categories to your Product Catalog and mark any product as favorite for quick access.
- You can sort your products by Category or Alphabetically in your list.
- You can calculate total /selected /remaining cost for your list.
- You can track your list as quantity and cost by marking the relevant products during shopping.
- You can set an alarm to receive notification for your planned shopping-time.
- You can send your lists to your friends with a single click. You can write optional messages while sending the list. In addition to in-app sending, you can share your list by whatsapp, e-mail, message etc.

Our application is updated according to your comments and suggestions. Your feedback is very important to us in order to make our application more beautiful. You can contact us at “icmosoftware@gmail.com“.

title: Shopping List - Smart Shopping

container.value: Yiğitler Mah. 357 Sok. No:13/7 İzmir Türkiye

creator: ICMO Software
descriptionHtml:
It will be your best assistant during grocery shopping and you will not use pen/paper any more.
Highlighted features:

Easy to use
- Our app has all the features you may need for shopping and has simple interface to use all those features.
- Creating and managing your grocery list is easier than you think.

Product Catalog
- By using catalog during list creation, you will easily find any product you want and add it to your list.
- You can use search feature to search entire database. Our smart catalog will make suggestions while searching.
- Product catalog has lots of categories and products by default. You can edit it anytime you want.
- You can add new products and new categories to your catalog and mark any product as favorite for quick access.

Smart sorting
- You can sort your products by Category, by Insertion order or Alphabetically in your grocery list.

Cost calculation
- You can add price and quantity for any product and calculate Total /Selected /Remaining cost for your shopping list.
- You can track your list as quantity and cost by marking the relevant products during shopping.

Sharing your list
- You can send your lists to your friends with a single click. You can even write an optional message.
- When someone sends you a list, you will automatically receive a notification. You can do all the operations on the received list as if it was created by you.
- In addition to in-app sending, you can share your shopping list by whatsapp, e-mail, message etc.

Color selection
- You can change the color of the app. You have lots of colors to select from.

Setting alarm
- You will not forget your shopping time. You can set an alarm to receive notification for your planned grocery shopping.

We want our application is to be the best free grocery shopping list app. Your feedback is very important for us. We update our app according to your comments and suggestions. You can contact us at “icmosoftware@gmail.com“.
descriptionShort: Free grocery list for smart shopping. Create and share your shopping list easily

title: Shopping List - Grocery Shopping

creator: ICMO Software
descriptionHtml:
Is it hard to keep in mind what you want to buy before shopping? Are you looking for an easy to use shopping list app? If so, this shopping list creator app is perfect for you. It is one of the best shopping list apps free!

With this shop list maker app, all you need to do is to add a things to buy list before you go to the market. When you go to the market you can easily fill your shopping cart by using this grocery list generator app. You will no longer forget any product you need to buy!

FEATURES
- Easy to use shop list app & simple interface.
- You can share your smart shopping list with a single click.
- You can set price for products and calculate total, selected, remaining cost of your shopping list in this home grocery list app.
- It works offline.
- You can sort your products by category, insertion order or alphabetic order.
- You will easily find the product you want to add to your list. You can select the product from categories or search it. Besides, you can edit categories.
- You can add any product to your favorite list so it will be very easy to find later on.
- You can set alarms for your lists by using this grocery list reminder app. You will receive a notification when the time comes.
- You can customize the theme as you want.

With this grocery list app with calculator, it is really easy to prepare your shopping lists. Download this list sharing app and start managing your shopping lists!

Your feedback is very important for us. We update our grocery list organizer app according to your feedback.
You can contact us at icmosoftware@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: It is one of the grocery list apps for free. A grocery list app with prices.
